name: Unbrella
description:
Summary

Make your way to the flower with the help of your trusty unbrella.

Controls

Move - W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys

Interact - Space

Credits

Programming - OneThatEatYou

Art - OneThatEatYou

Premade Assets:

Rain SFX - Heavy Raining by adsabbhelp on Pixabay

Start Button SFX - Generated using Bfxr

Flower bloom SFX - Steam Burst by pengo_au

Wind SFX - Wind by Black Boe

Umbrella (Open) - Opening the Umbrella by filipiwo

Umbrella (Placed) - Thud by OtisJames

Footsteps - Arch Leaf by bsumusictech

Dev's Comment

Currently, only the last 2 levels are 'proper' levels. This project is mainly for me to try out a new version of Unity and also to practice my level design. Any feedback is very much welcomed.
